document_data.mainbody:
he Great Worm Cavern was the traditional ancestor mound of the Great Worm Tribe of Uthgardt in the North. It was dedicated to the Great Worm beast totem.
It lay at the base of a mountain in the Spine of the World range,
The caverns were part of a vast underground complex.
Inside the biggest cavern was the ancestor mound itself, a large altar mound shaped like a great spiraling winged snake, which was the Great Worm.
The central cavern was the home of Elrem the Wise, shaman of the Great Worm Tribe, potentially Uthgars living son, and a great worm.
